prompts.title: Morning Motivation Post
prompts.prompt: 🌅 Start your day strong! Share your top 3 morning habits for crushing your fitness goals. #MorningRoutine #FitnessJourney

prompts.title: Transformation Story
prompts.prompt: 💪 Post your before-and-after journey and tell your audience what changed the game for you. #TransformationTuesday

prompts.title: Workout of the Day
prompts.prompt: 🔥 Today's Workout: {exercise1}, {exercise2}, {exercise3}. How many rounds can you do? Tag a friend to join! #WOD #TrainHard

prompts.title: Myth-Busting Post
prompts.prompt: ❌ Fitness Myth Alert: {myth}. Here's why that's wrong and what to do instead. #FitnessFacts

prompts.title: Healthy Recipe Share
prompts.prompt: 🥗 Quick, healthy meal idea for busy hustlers: {recipe}. Tag someone who needs this today! #MealPrep #HealthyEating

prompts.title: Gym Humor Meme
prompts.prompt: 😂 When you hit the gym and forget your headphones… relatable? Drop your favorite workout playlist below! #GymLife

prompts.title: Client Testimonial
prompts.prompt: 🎯 Client Spotlight: {client_name} crushed their {goal} in {time}. Here's how we did it together! #SuccessStory

prompts.title: Fitness Challenge Invite
prompts.prompt: 🔥 Join our 7-Day {Challenge Name}! Drop 'IN' if you're ready to level up your fitness game! #FitnessChallenge

prompts.title: Behind-the-Scenes
prompts.prompt: 🎥 BTS of my workout shoot today! Who wants to see the full routine? #BehindTheScenes

prompts.title: Quick Tip Carousel
prompts.prompt: 💡 5 Hacks to Boost Your Workout Performance! Swipe 👉 for #3 (it's a game-changer!)

prompts.title: My Gear Post
prompts.prompt: 🎽 These are my go-to gym essentials: {list of gear}. What's your must-have? #GymGear

prompts.title: Motivational Quote
prompts.prompt: 🔥 'The body achieves what the mind believes.' Who agrees? Drop a 💪 if you're committed today! #MondayMotivation

prompts.title: Workout Poll
prompts.prompt: 📊 Which do you prefer: Home Workouts 🏠 or Gym Sessions 🏋️‍♂️? Vote below! #FitnessCommunity

prompts.title: Fitness Giveaway
prompts.prompt: 🎁 Giveaway Alert! Win {prize}. To enter: 1️⃣ Follow 2️⃣ Like this post 3️⃣ Tag {number} gym buddies. Winner on {date}! #Giveaway

prompts.title: Macro Breakdown
prompts.prompt: 🍎 Here's what my macros look like for a full day of eating: {details}. Want the full meal plan? Comment 'PLAN'! #NutritionTips

prompts.title: Progress Update
prompts.prompt: 📅 Week {number} of {program_name}: down {X lbs/kg}, energy up ✅. Who else is tracking progress this week? #ConsistencyWins

prompts.title: Mobility Routine
prompts.prompt: 🧘 Mobility Monday: Here are 3 stretches I do before every workout. Save this for later! #StretchItOut

prompts.title: Supplement Stack
prompts.prompt: 💊 Here's my current supplement stack and why I use each one. What's in your stack? #Supplements

prompts.title: Fitness FAQ
prompts.prompt: ❓Q&A Time! Drop your biggest fitness question below and I'll answer them in my next reel! #AskMeAnything

prompts.title: Morning Workout Reel
prompts.prompt: ☀️ Quick 10-min morning workout for busy people: {exercise1}, {exercise2}, {exercise3}. No excuses! #FitnessHacks

prompts.title: Weekend Motivation
prompts.prompt: 🏆 Weekend is here! Are you working out or taking a rest day? #FitnessLifestyle

prompts.title: Calorie Swap Tip
prompts.prompt: ⚖️ Swap this for that: {high-calorie item} → {healthier option}. Big difference for small change! #NutritionHacks

prompts.title: Shoutout Post
prompts.prompt: 🔥 Huge shoutout to {follower/client} for hitting their PR today! Drop a 💯 to celebrate them! #CommunityStrong

prompts.title: Weekly Challenge
prompts.prompt: 🚨 Weekly Challenge: 100 push-ups in 7 days. Are you in? Drop 'READY'! #PushUpChallenge

prompts.title: Relatable Meme
prompts.prompt: 😂 When you skip leg day but still want that summer body… Who's guilty? #NoLegDaySkipped

prompts.title: Form Check Reel
prompts.prompt: 📹 Common mistakes in {exercise name} and how to fix them! Save this for later! #FormTips

prompts.title: Hydration Tip
prompts.prompt: 💧 Are you drinking enough water? Here's how much you need daily: {formula}. #StayHydrated

prompts.title: Self-Care Reminder
prompts.prompt: 🛌 Recovery is part of progress! Share your favorite way to relax after a hard workout. #RecoveryDay
